name: query
template:
SELECT * FROM algemeen
WHERE machine='{{flow.machine}}'
ORDER BY id
DESC LIMIT 1;

name: query
template:
DELETE FROM algemeen
WHERE machine='{{flow.machine}}'
ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

name: query
template:
INSERT INTO algemeen 
    (machine, status, draad, persoon)
    
VALUES 
(
    '{{flow.machine}}',
    '{{flow.statusFout}}',
    '{{flow.draad}}',
    'tablet'
);

name: query
template:
SELECT * FROM orders
WHERE machine='{{flow.machine}}'
ORDER BY id
DESC LIMIT 1;

name: query
template:
SELECT TIMEDIFF
(NOW(), 

(SELECT timestamp FROM algemeen
WHERE machine='{{flow.machine}}'
AND persoon='tablet'
AND CURRENT_TIME > '07:30:00'
AND CURRENT_TIME < '16:30:00'
ORDER BY id
DESC LIMIT 1)) AS time_diff;
